description:
Aleksandra Ivanovna Pokryshkin is a Captain from the Orussian Army`s 216th Fighter Aviation Regiment. She is a witch known for being a great commander and strategist. She is mostly active on the front lines in the south, and flies repainted brown MiG-60 striker units. Aleksandra is based on ace http://anidb.net/ch85335 [Alexander Ivanovich Pokryshkin], second best ace of USSR and anti-Hitler coalition during WWII.
Note: Due to how family names in Russian change based on the person`s gender, her official name is actually spelled wrong; the form in proper Russian would be Aleksandra Ivanovna Pokryshkina instead.
name: Aleksandra Ivanovna Pokryshkin
